response.product_title: Logitech MX Master 3 Advanced Wireless Mouse
response.category: Electronics > Computer Accessories > Mice & Pointing Devices
response.description: The Logitech MX Master 3 Advanced Wireless Mouse offers a remarkable experience for users who seek precision, control, and customization. It features a MagSpeed Electromagnetic scrolling wheel that is ultra-fast and silent. It's crafted to be ergonomic with an ideally placed thumb wheel and controls for seamless workflow.

specifications.battery_life: Up to 70 days on a single full charge

top_positive_review.author: Michael S.
top_positive_review.review_text: The MX Master 3 has significantly improved my workflow. Its ergonomic design, combined with the customization of buttons, has made it a staple on my desk. Highly recommended for professionals.

top_critical_review.author: Casey R.
top_critical_review.review_text: The mouse works fine, but I had issues pairing it with multiple devices. It's a bit pricey for the features it offers.
